sentences.english: Rhetoric, or oratory, teaches how to use language effectively;
sentences.chinese: 修辭學或者叫做演講術是教你如何有效地使用語言。

sentences.english: Of the modes of persuasion some belong strictly to the art of rhetoric and some do not.
sentences.chinese: 在說服性論證中，有些完全屬於修辭學，有些則不然。

sentences.english: But, first of all, let us classify rhetoric into its varieties.
sentences.chinese: 但首先讓我們將修辭學加以分類。

sentences.english: Context is more important and complex in elaborative theory than in rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 語境在闡釋學中的比修辭學中更爲重要，也更爲複雜。

sentences.english: The language structure of the text is the object of the study of Chinese cultural rhetorics.
sentences.chinese: 文本語言結構是中國文化修辭學研究的一個對象。

sentences.english: A curious collection of flowers of rhetoric in Spanish verse could be made from it.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙詩句中修辭學奇葩可能就是從中而來。

sentences.english: The opening significance of Liu's novel annotations can not be overlooked.
sentences.chinese: 劉氏小說評點在修辭學史上的開創意義不容忽視。

sentences.english: Zhang Lianqiang is a famous rhetorician in China.
sentences.chinese: 張煉強先生是我國著名的修辭學家。

sentences.english: Wangyi was a rhetorician who made outstanding contribution in early 20 th century.
sentences.chinese: 王易是中國20世紀早期做出了突出貢獻的修辭學家。

sentences.english: The Origin of Rhetoric is a classical work of Chinese rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 《修辭學發凡》是漢語修辭學的經典著作。

sentences.english: The Origin of Rhetoric is a classical work of Chinese rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 《修辭學發凡》是漢語修辭學的經典著作。

sentences.english: Zong Tingfu has made a great contribution to China rhetoric history research.
sentences.chinese: 宗廷虎對中國修辭學史研究作出了巨大的貢獻。

sentences.english: Antithesis is a figure of speech in rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 對照是修辭學中的一個修辭格。
